user.title: NSP Energy Rates Setup
user.description:
This integration tracks Nova Scotia Power's Time-Varying Pricing (TVP). Rates are determined by the time of day and season as recorded by your smart meter.

**Warning:** Do not change these rates unless you are certain NSP has updated their tariff. 2026 rates are pre-filled.

Note: Including tax adds 15% HST to calculations.

init.title: Adjust NSP Rates
init.description: Update these values if NSP changes their rate structure in the future. It is recommended to leave these at default unless you know exactly what you are doing.
